title: Romancing the SEAL: Hero's Honor Book 2
description: Romancing the SEAL: Hero's Honor Book 2"Tyâ€™s fingers worked each of her buttons then she pulled the linen fabric off her body as she watched him take his uniform off. He was fast, each piece of multi-green clothing hitting the floor with a thud."Ty is the man of the moment, a SEAL who has made the international news with his heroics at the children's hospital defusing a dreadful situation where many lives were at risk. Ty faces another difficult situation when out of the blue his ex Rachel gets in touch. With his head still spinning from his brief encounter with Leonie (and the explosion) he has to decide who he wants to declare his love to. Can he decide and what are the consequences for a bad decision? Ty's bravery has earned him another medal. Will taking his ex to the awards ceremony be his first wrong move? Ty is an attractive SEAL with a big dilemma! Rachel or Leonie? Both or none? Find out in Romancing the SEAL: Hero's Honor Book 2
author: Abigail Austin
